* Question1:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#read dataset
pols_month <- read.csv("./data/pols-month.csv")
snp <- read.csv("./data/snp.csv")
unemployment <- read.csv("./data/unemployment.csv")
```

```{r}
pols_month_clean <- 
  pols_month%>%
  janitor::clean_names()%>%
  separate(col = mon , into = c('year','month','day'),sep = '-',convert = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(month = month.name[month])%>%
  mutate(president = case_when(
      prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem",
      prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop"
    ))%>%
  select(-prez_dem, -prez_gop,-day)
```


```{r}
snp_clean <- 
  snp%>%
  janitor::clean_names()%>%
  separate(col = date , into = c('month','day','year'),sep = '/',convert = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(month = month.name[month])%>%
  relocate(year,month)%>%
  mutate(month = factor(month,levels = c( "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December")))%>%
  arrange(year,month)
```

```{r}
unemployment_clean <- 
  unemployment%>%
  pivot_longer(cols = Jan:Dec,names_to = 'month',values_to = 'percent')
```
